Package io.mrshannon.hexmek.controllers

Class GameController

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.mrshannon.hexmek.controllers.GameController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Controller
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    EndOfTurnController, FireController, MoveController, PromptController
    public class GameController
extends Object
implements Controller
    Base class of all controllers used to play the game. It provides storage for the map and players as well as many utility methods. Running this controller will simply return itself.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      GameController​(GameController other)
      Construct a game controller from another game controller.
      GameController​(HexMap map, List<Player> players)
      Construct a game controller from the map and players.
